RevisionEvent.Note: BARREL Instruments: SPASE 2.3.0 XML resource description, last known revision, metadata submitted by LFB, reviewed by Reine Chimiak
BARREL Instruments: SPASE description revised to standardize the Information URL content for all BARREL instrument descriptions, upgrade to SPASE 2.4.0, metadata submitted by LFB

ResourceHeader.Description:
This document describes the BARREL Balloon 2L Ephemeris, EPHM, virtual instrument.

Trajectory positions are provided in various coordinate systems
